attributes.action: make 5 hours of phisical education a week compulsory for people all ages up to the end of Key Stage 4, this is for the greater good of the health of the nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Child obesity is becoming a national crisis and doctors and scientists are consistently telling us exercise is essential. This will be the only way forwards for unfortunate children who do get enough exposure to sport and exercise. I hope people are honest enough to realise this potential crisis and do the correct thing, please sign.

Thank You
